name: Caesar Salad Pinwheels
author: Dole
summary: Sun-dried tomatoes in a cream cheese spread add color and creaminess to these delicious Caesar salad pinwheels.
ingredients: ¼ cup sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and finely chopped
1 (11 ounce) package DOLE® Ultimate Caesar Kit
directions: Combine cream cheese, sun-dried tomatoes and herb-seasoning from salad kit in medium bowl; blend well
Lightly crush garlic croutons from kit
Combine romaine, cheese and crushed croutons from kit in large bowl
On each roll, spread cream cheese mixture over lavash bread; cover with a thin layer of salad mixture
(For flour tortillas, fold in sides before rolling up)
Secure each roll with 5 to 6 wooden picks
Slice rolls between wooden picks to form pinwheel appetizers
